How to set custom bitrates on firmware 1.6.1 in autoexec.ash. See the bitrate_mod directory for an example.

To set a custom bitrate for a resolution do:
writew [address] [bitrate]

ex:
writew 0xA0646C9E 0x42AC
makes 3840x2160 30p high quality setting encode at 90mbs

bitrates (you can pick values in between or above these for fine tuning):
0x4190 18mbs
0x41F0 30mbs
0x4210 36mbs
0x4220 40mbs
0x4234 45mbs
0x4270 60mbs
0x4284 70mbs
0x4298 80mbs
0x42AC 90mbs
0x42C8 100mbs
0x42D4 110mbs
0x42E8 120mbs
0x42FC 130mbs
0x4306 140mbs
0x4310 150mbs
0x431A 160mbs

(120mbs works if your card is fast enough, the camera crashes if 150mbs is used 
for more than like 3 seconds. If you want to properly test if your card can 
handle a bitrate you need to test for more than a few minutes preferably 
recording lots of motion. If you get a slow sd card error it means your sd card 
is too slow and that the camera stopped recording for a few seconds in order to 
catch up)


addresses for high quality bitrate (+0x10 = medium, +0x20 = low):

NTSC:
0xA0646C9E 3840x2160 30P 16:9
0xA0646CCE 3840x2160 24P 16:9
0xA0646CFE 3840x2160 24P 16:9 super
0xA0646D2E 2976x2976 30P 1:1
0xA0646D5E 2688x2688 30P 1:1
0xA0646D8E 2704x1520 60P 16:9
0xA0646DBE 2704x1520 30P 16:9
0xA0646DEE 2704x1520 48P 16:9
0xA0646E1E 2704x1520 24P 16:9
0xA0646E4E 2704x1520 30P 16:9 super
0xA0646E7E 2704x2032 30P 4:3
0xA0646EAE 2560x1920 30P 4:3
0xA0646EDE 2560x1440 60P 16:9
0xA0646F0E 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA0646F3E HDR 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA0646F6E 2304x1296 30P 16:9
0xA0646F9E 1920x1440 60P 4:3
0xA0646FCE 1920x1440 30P 4:3
0xA0646FFE 1920x1440 48P 4:3
0xA064702E 1920x1440 24P 4:3
0xA064705E 1920x1080 60P 16:9
0xA064708E 1920x1080 60P 16:9 super
0xA06470BE 1920x1080 45P 16:9
0xA06470EE 1920x1080 40P 16:9
0xA064711E 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA064714E 1920x1080 30P 16:9 super
0xA064717E HDR 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA06471AE 1920x1080 60I 16:9
0xA06471DE 1440x1080 60P 16:9
0xA064720E 1440x1080 30P 16:9
0xA064723E 1440x1080 60I 16:9
0xA064726E 1600x1200 60P 4:3
0xA064729E 1600x1200 30P 4:3
0xA06472CE 1440x1080 30P 4:3
0xA06472FE 1600x900 30P 16:9
0xA064732E 1280x720 60P 16:9
0xA064735E 1280x720 60P 16:9 super
0xA064738E 1280x720 30P 16:9
0xA06473BE 848x480 60P 16:9
0xA06473EE 848x480 30P 16:9
0xA064741E 848x480 30P 16:9 super
0xA064744E 848x480 60P 16:9 super
0xA064747E 720x480 60P 16:9
0xA06474AE 720x480 30P 4:3
0xA06474DE 1280x960 60P 4:3
0xA064750E 1280x960 30P 4:3
0xA064753E 960x540 30P 16:9
0xA064756E 640x360 30P 16:9
0xA064759E 640x480 60P 4:3
0xA06475CE 640x480 30P 4:3
0xA06475FE 432x240 60P 16:9
0xA064762E 432x240 30P 16:9
0xA064765E 320x240 30P 4:3
0xA064768E 352x240 30P 4:3
0xA06476BE 2560x1440 50P 16:9
0xA06476EE 1920x1080 48P 16:9
0xA064771E 1920x1080 24P 16:9
0xA064774E 1920x1080 15P 16:9
0xA064777E 1600x1200 48P 4:3
0xA06477AE 1600x1200 24P 4:3
0xA06477DE 1280x960 48P 4:3
0xA064780E 1280x960 24P 4:3
0xA064783E 1280x720 48P 16:9
0xA064786E 1280x720 24P 16:9
0xA064789E 848x480 48P 16:9
0xA06478CE 848x480 24P 16:9
0xA06478FE 640x480 48P 4:3
0xA064792E 640x480 24P 4:3
0xA064795E Precise
0xA064798E 1920x1080 120P 16:9
0xA06479BE 1920x1080 120P 16:9 super
0xA06479EE 1920x1080 100P 16:9
0xA0647A1E 1280x720 240P 16:9
0xA0647A4E 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA0647A7E 1280x720 120P 16:9
0xA0647AAE 1280x720 120P 16:9 super
0xA0647ADE 848x480 240P 16:9
0xA0647B0E 848x480 120P 16:9
0xA0647B3E 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA0647B6E 848x480 120P 16:9 super
0xA0647B9E 640x480 240P 4:3
0xA0647BCE 640x480 120P 4:3
0xA0647BFE 432x240 240P 16:9
0xA0647C2E 432x240 120P 16:9
0xA0647C5E 320x240 120P 4:3
0xA0647C8E 1280x960 120P 4:3
0xA0647CBE 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super

PAL:
0xA0646C9E 3840x2160 25P 16:9
0xA0646CCE 3840x2160 24P 16:9
0xA0646CFE 3840x2160 24P 16:9 super
0xA0646D2E 2976x2976 25P 1:1
0xA0646D5E 2688x2688 25P 1:1
0xA0646D8E 2704x1520 50P 16:9
0xA0646DBE 2704x1520 25P 16:9
0xA0646DEE 2704x1520 48P 16:9
0xA0646E1E 2704x1520 24P 16:9
0xA0646E4E 2704x1520 25P 16:9 super
0xA0646E7E 2704x2032 25P 4:3
0xA0646EAE 2560x1920 25P 4:3
0xA0646EDE 2560x1440 50P 16:9
0xA0646F0E 2560x1440 25P 16:9
0xA0646F3E HDR 2560x1440 25P 16:9
0xA0646F6E 2304x1296 25P 16:9

0xA0646FCE 1920x1440 25P 4:3
0xA0646FFE 1920x1440 48P 4:3

0xA064708E 1920x1080 50P 16:9 super

0xA06470EE 1920x1080 40P 16:9

0xA064714E 1920x1080 25P 16:9 super

0xA06471AE 1920x1080 50I 16:9
0xA06471DE 1440x1080 50P 16:9
0xA064720E 1440x1080 25P 16:9
0xA064723E 1440x1080 50I 16:9
0xA064726E 1600x1200 50P 4:3
0xA064729E 1600x1200 25P 4:3
0xA06472CE 1440x1080 25P 4:3
0xA06472FE 1600x900 25P 16:9
0xA064732E 1280x720 50P 16:9

0xA064738E 1280x720 25P 16:9
0xA06473BE 848x480 50P 16:9
0xA06473EE 848x480 25P 16:9
0xA064741E 848x480 50P 16:9 super
0xA064744E 848x480 25P 16:9 super
0xA064747E 720x480 50P 16:9
0xA06474AE 720x480 25P 4:3
0xA06474DE 1280x960 50P 4:3
0xA064750E 1280x960 25P 4:3
0xA064753E 960x540 25P 16:9
0xA064756E 640x360 25P 16:9
0xA064759E 640x480 50P 4:3
0xA06475CE 640x480 25P 4:3
0xA06475FE 432x240 50P 16:9
0xA064762E 432x240 25P 16:9
0xA064765E 320x240 25P 4:3
0xA064768E 352x240 25P 4:3
0xA06476BE 2560x1440 60P 16:9
0xA06476EE 1920x1080 48P 16:9
0xA064771E 1920x1080 24P 16:9
0xA064774E 1920x1080 15P 16:9

0xA06478CE 848x480 24P 16:9
0xA06478FE 640x480 48P 4:3
0xA064792E 640x480 24P 4:3
0xA064795E Precise
0xA064798E 1920x1080 100P 16:9
0xA06479BE 1920x1080 100P 16:9 super
0xA06479EE 1920x1080 100P 16:9
0xA0647A1E 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA0647A4E 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA0647A7E 1280x720 100P 16:9
0xA0647AAE 1280x720 100P 16:9 super
0xA0647ADE 848x480 200P 16:9
0xA0647B0E 848x480 100P 16:9
0xA0647B3E 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA0647B6E 848x480 100P 16:9 super
0xA0647B9E 640x480 200P 4:3
0xA0647BCE 640x480 100P 4:3
0xA0647BFE 432x240 200P 16:9
0xA0647C2E 432x240 100P 16:9
0xA0647C5E 320x240 100P 16:9
0xA0647C8E 1280x960 100P 4:3
0xA0647CBE 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super

The resolution/bitrate table is located in /dev/mtdblock1 at position 
0x00546C98. This entire partition gets loaded into memory at boot at offset 
0xA0100000.
